project_name.justification: The text identifies two sets of claims, with the second set being the project of interest: "An additional 42 claims have been staked... These claims are now designated as the “Bayan Springs South” Project."

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified at the beginning of the announcement: "Balkan Mining and Minerals Ltd (ASX: BMM; “Balkan”, “BMM” or “the Company”) is pleased to announce that it has filed staking applications for a new package of land..."

ceo_buyer.justification: The contact person and executive director is named in the document: "Executive Director Fadi Diab, commented:..." and "For further information, please contact: Fadi Diab Executive Director".

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction is a staking of claims. While this typically implies 100% ownership, the document does not explicitly state an acquisition percentage.

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata lists Au. The text supports this, stating the project is located near the "Bellview Au-Ag-Pb Deposit" and within the "prolific Carlin trend—a prolific mineral belt in Nevada with a history of gold discoveries."

verified_article_link.justification: The provided text is relevant to the Bayan Springs South project, but a full, verifiable URL for the article is not present in the source documents.

currency.justification: The transaction is a staking of claims, not a purchase. No financial consideration or currency is mentioned in the text.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is a staking of claims. No cash payment is mentioned in the text.

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is a staking of claims. No share payment is mentioned in the text.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction is a staking of claims. No combined cash and share payment is mentioned in the text.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction is a staking of claims. No shares were issued as part of the transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options are mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction is a staking of claims. No shares were issued, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans but does not specify a commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions future exploration plans such as "design of an initial reconnaissance mapping and sampling program" but does not state a specific monetary value for an exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or similar royalty is mentioned as being acquired or retained in the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text provides a total area for two projects combined: "158 claims (~13 km2)". It specifies that Bayan Springs South consists of 42 claims, but does not provide a specific area for this project alone. Per the rules, calculations are not permitted.

coverage_area_unit.justification: Corresponds to the null coverage_area_raw field as no specific area for the project was provided.

resource_size.justification: The text describes the project as a "greenfield exploration opportunity" and explicitly states that any mentioned resources belong to other companies' nearby projects: "This announcement contains references to mineral exploration results derived by other parties either nearby or proximate to the Bayan Springs North and South Projects...such discoveries or geological similarities do not in any way guarantee that the Company will have similar exploration successes..."

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's name is followed by its ticker and exchange in the required format: "Balkan Mining and Minerals Ltd (ASX: BMM; “Balkan”, “BMM” or “the Company”)".
